description: A comprehensive online map can be found: hereThis map shows all existing Trail Heads and Trails, each shown in different colors. These correspond with the colored markers that can be found on the trails. Brief descriptions of each trail are also provided under the map.LUPINE TRAIL - Moderate Hike (Time=22min, Length=0.9km, Elevation change=-40m)Connects Arrowleaf to the North Overlook. This trail passes through a cooler climate zone ? note the abundance of fir trees and moss. Watch for ?twisted sisters?, a rare tree growth.Arrowleaf Trail is identified with yellow trail markers. Proceed along Arrowleaf Trail until you come across blue Lupine Trail markers [North Overlook]This overlook showcases the Oyama isthmus, gorgeous Kalamalka Lake and Silver Star Mountain.Directions to UPPER LAKES TRAIL HEADFrom Highway 97, take Oceola Road to "The Lakes" subdivision turning right onto Lake Hill Drive, turn left onto Shoreline Drive and then left onto Apex Drive. At the end of Apex Drive continue up gravel road to the left to the parking area below the water tank. Trail Head is marked with a WALC (Walk Around Lake Country) sign.
title: Spion Kop LUPINE TRAIL
